name: DHCPOptions
description: Creates a set of DHCP options for your VPC.

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: A domain name of your choice.

properties.name: DomainNameServers
properties.description: The IP (IPv4) address of a domain name server. You can specify up to four addresses.

properties.name: NetbiosNameServers
properties.description: The IP address (IPv4) of a NetBIOS name server. You can specify up to four addresses.

properties.name: NetbiosNodeType
properties.description: An integer value indicating the NetBIOS node type:

properties.name: NtpServers
properties.description: The IP address (IPv4) of a Network Time Protocol (NTP) server. You can specify up to four addresses.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) for this resource.
